alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:20PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Russell, northeastern Scott and central Washington Counties through 300 PM EST... At 220 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Cleveland Va, or 15 miles northwest of Bristol Va, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Cleveland Va, Honaker, St. Paul, Nickelsville, Dungannon, Rosedale, Lindell, Dye and Collingwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
